name: Lent (Demo Ver.)
description:
Welcome to Lent, a 2D-RPG  with personality!  

This is a beta version of the project I've been working on for the past few months.  I've worked it to be a standalone demo/preview for the full project. There's approximately 10-15 minutes of solid game-play as of now.  In the future, I plan on releasing a full version as a separate release. 

 I'm looking to see if I can get any sort of feedback on this as I move forward with development.   Please let me know of any bugs or errors that you find, as well as any other comments you might have.  I live for your feedback!  I also wanted to garner a bit of an audience.  So: if you enjoy my game, please share it with others!
